difficulties.name: Platinum Difficulty 1
difficulties.description: Vanilla + IALR Content: Play the vanilla game with the Mods content including hundreds of new weapons including bows, crossbows, flamethrowers, throwing weapons, throwables, and items. This version also adds over 1500+ new enemy and human variants to the game. Modify the vanilla game to your ideal playstyle with the Mod config.

difficulties.name: Platinum Difficulty 2
difficulties.description: Casual Survivor: This version of the mod reduces the threat of the Volatiles from the vanilla game while increasing the intelligence of the humans, biters, and other infected. Great for players who want to learn the ropes and enjoy Parkour and the new items from the Mod without worrying too much.
